meanings.definition: Not accused or claimed to have committed a crime.
meanings.sent1: The unalleged suspect was released due to lack of evidence.
meanings.sent2: The unalleged individual had a clean record.
meanings.sent3: The unalleged thief turned out to be a squirrel stealing nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her unalleged innocence shone brightly in the courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The unalleged status of the defendant was a relief to their family.

meanings.definition: Not asserted or claimed to be true or existing.
meanings.sent1: The unalleged theory was quickly dismissed by experts.
meanings.sent2: The unalleged document was deemed unreliable.
meanings.sent3: The unalleged ghost story made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His unalleged talent for painting surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unalleged existence of aliens sparked a heated debate.
